name: package.json
description: Rudimentary forum with posts and comments, a random page function, and using endangered animals as usernames.

scripts.uninstall: npm uninstall body-parser --save && npm uninstall express --save && npm uninstall express-handlebars --save && npm uninstall handlebars --save && npm uninstall mongodb --save
scripts.install: npm install body-parser --save && npm install express --save && npm install express-handlebars --save && npm install handlebars@4.0.0 --save && npm install mongodb --save
scripts.reinstall: npm run uninstall && npm run install
scripts.build: handlebars views/partials/post.handlebars -f public/postTemplate.js && handlebars views/partials/comment.handlebars -f public/commentTemplate.js

author: Nathaniel Pelzl <pelzln@oregonstate.edu>
